rb.line_comment_text.text: . But =begin and =end should be first on a line.

rb.line_comment_body.text: #. But =begin and =end should be first on a line.

rb.line_comment.text: like#. But =begin and =end should be first on a line.

rb.line_comments.text:
#!/usr/bin/ruby -w

puts "Hello, Ruby!"

=begin
This is a multiline comment and can span as many lines as you
like#. But =begin and =end should be first on a line. 
=end

puts "=begin NOT A BLOCK COMMENT =end"
